hero.description: Specialist in transforming complex business rules into robust software solutions. Focused on security, performance, and user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.devDesc: Responsible for the agricultural and livestock modules of the Agrix software. Development based on complex business rules for agricultural management.
about.netDesc: Management and maintenance of network infrastructure, ensuring stability and security.
about.eduDesc: Graduated with a focus on information security.
about.tccName: "Executable Analysis for Beginners: An Introduction to Reverse Engineering"
about.tccDesc: An in-depth study on reverse engineering techniques aimed at educational and security purposes.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.agrixDesc: Agricultural management software. I act as responsible for agricultural and livestock modules, implementing critical business rules for the sector.
projects.debtDesc: Debt control and management system developed in partnership with RomeraSCR. Allows account management and installment control.

footer.title: Let's Talk?
footer.description: I am always open to new opportunities and partnerships. If you have a project in mind or just want to chat, get in touch!
